issue.title: [Rust] Turn explicit SIMD off by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8616](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8616). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We plan to remove packed_simd so we should turn it off by default.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8616?focusedCommentId=17101203) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7057
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7057>
